channel.title: Help with a server
channel.description:
ok first off if you are reading this please post something.!
Now: i have downloaded and edited a source, so how do i fix everything to say its mine? it says other names, for instance my source Kittyscape that i made into a amazing server made dragon plates and dragon kites and customized alot of rares and stuff. how do i make it say its ""MY"" server? i went through the Jave.Client and switched all Kitty to my name but that didnt work, the source is it hardcoded as in security were it portects that or what do i need to do?
please help or post a tut or a address for a tut or w/e
if im breaking rules dont post just mod please move or redirect thread.
thanks![br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2007, 07:07:26 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Help with a server
item.dc:creator: @Pizz4_0wnz Pizz4 0wnz
item.description:
@Pizz4_0wnz wrote:

ok…type ctrl+h and type in the space replace all:kittyscape then in the next space you type your server name

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a server

item.description:
@zaper123456 wrote:

ok first off if you are reading this please post something.!

Now: i have downloaded and edited a source, so how do i fix everything to say its mine? it says other names, for instance my source Kittyscape that i made into a amazing server made dragon plates and dragon kites and customized alot of rares and stuff. how do i make it say its ““MY”” server? i went through the Jave.Client and switched all Kitty to my name but that didnt work, the source is it hardcoded as in security were it portects that or what do i need to do?

please help
or
post a tut or a address for a tut or w/e
